name: Omar Reneau
text:
The best pizza spot in Porterville.  Clean and covid-19 social distancing and cleaning is continuously improving with this well trained staff.
Shout out to Esmer and the entire Blaze Pizza team. ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Smith
text: Look, I grew up on real pizza. NY style and in the pizza capitol Old Forge Pennsylvania. I've had the best. That said, its so hard to find good pizza out here in Cali. The things that Blaze has going for it is their ingredients and their ‚Ä¶More

name: Leo Sanchez
text: Amazing pizza. Fast and super friendly service. I think this is by far the best service I have had from ANY restaurant. I've been there twice so far and they always come by and check to see if everything is ok, they will offer to refill ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Hammer
text: This was the worst pizza experience ever. Did a mobile order to be ready by noon. I arrived at 11:45 and waited 15 minutes  when a lady picked up her order, i sat at the table she had waited at. They came and told me I couldn't sit there. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordan Jones
text: Really good food, and great staff. Pizza was timely and declious. Store was super clean and has a great atmosphere to it. Like to bring my family and friends to eat here.

name: Manuel Mejia
text: Very considerate and polite people! Making and eating a pizza never felt easier. Pizza comes out just perfectly made and don‚Äôt have to worry about it being undercooked or overcooked. Plus, having the Blaze app comes in handy! Lots of specials, deals, and points for just eating there!

name: Zinnia
text: I placed an order online and they did mess up my order but Desiree was great and corrected my order without any problems or hesitation. Food is great and staff is friendly with great customer service.

name: Alec Garcia
text: The environment here was awesome! Everyone there was friendly and nice. The food was made to perfection. Once I walked in, Ivan made us feel welcomed and made us feel like his priority was to make sure everyone was taken care of. Definitely will be going back!

name: Manuel Correa
text: Was not happy with service. Manager was rude .

name: Debbie Melvin
text: The employees were polite and friendly...The manager Ivan was very courteous and took our trash...Also checked the ingredients of some of the drinks to see if I can drink them or not...love this place... great service and great pizza.. love the cauliflower crust pizza!!!

name: Enrique Navarrete
text: Yummy pizza love the place employees are nice and friendly

name: Cool Guy
text: This blaze has awesome people and fast service. The food is fresh . A lively atmosphere and cool place to relax and grab a bite. And the different varieties of pizza toppings is a plus. I'd recommend here anytime .

name: LT CMD DATA soong
text: This newly opened Blaze is just as good as any other if not better. Very friendly staff, everything is always really clean and service is generally quick and accurate. I highly recommend this place for all pizza lovers, you just cannot beat their personal pizzas!

name: Cherry Christenson
text: Blaze Pizza had quick service and lots of menu options for personalizing a pizza. The flaming oven brought a fun ambiance. Seating included booths and high-sitting tables. My pizza's crust was thin and tough, making for a nicely chewy slice.

name: Alisha Silva
text: The manager gave the best customer service! Pizza was amazing will come back for sure :)

name: Bill Brown
text: Had a great experience at the Porterville Blaze Pizza....pizza was cook very well,staff greeted us as we came in..Manager was named Ivan was very helpful and checked some ingredients  for my wife to see if she could drink them. Will definitely be  back.

name: cristian perez
text: Ivan is pretty dope ! We always greets us with a smile 10/10 would recommend üëèüèº

name: Robin Martorano
text: Love the many options given for the build your own pizza. Delicious food. Great staff. Clean environment. Fast and friendly.

name: Caleb McCrillis
text: My online order was given to someone else, or someone "took" it. I placed my first online order and arrived 30 min later to pick up when instructed it would be ready. I get there to pick up my order and they said someone else must have ‚Ä¶More

text: I liked it. Quick service good food.

name: Crystal Mendez
text: Was dining here tonight and experienced an aftershock from a 7.1 earthquake. One of the staff member's  took it upon him to go to each table to make sure everyone was okay and after making sure everyone was okay he started making jokes to ‚Ä¶More

name: Albert Konder
text: Had my first Blaze pizza. I was happy to see they had gluten free pizza, but it was very disappointing. It was pretty tasteless.........like a piece of cardboard bathed in oil. Couldn't finish it and didn't bother taking it with me. I was just happy I didn't have to eat it.

name: Brittany Ward
text: Great pizza and great customer service. The fired pizza crust is beyond anything in town! A welcomed addition to this area!  I  sat at the The high top table closest to the register and the only disappointing thing I saw was the clientele. ‚Ä¶More

text: Delicious pizza and good service

text: On duty manager was very helpful after I made a mistake with my rewards app. Love the pizza!

name: W. M.
text: Amazing taste and quality of the food! The staff is very nice. We've been 2x now in less than a week. I am here out of state working with the well renown Porterville OC hand crew program. They're also aware of the quality of Blaze's food

text: It was surprisingly good and I can't wait to go back.

text: This place was great! I had the gluten free crust and was surprised not only how fast it was ready,  but how great it tasted.  Even my wife, who is not a pizza fan,  liked it.

name: J B
text: They continuously get orders wrong. Make the mistake of not checking? You end up driving home and having a ruined meal with missing items. They take no responsibility for their errors. Additionally their phone does not work so you can call ‚Ä¶More

text: Took about 10-12 minutes from when I walked in, (I was about the 8th person back), to wait in line, have my pizza prepared, have it fired and my name called. Beyond amazed with the service, from both employees and food taste. This was my ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber Clark
text: Not the best service.   One girl was pushy about us picking our toppings it felt like it wasn't ok to take a minute to decide.  Being our first time here I wasn't sure what I wanted yet.  I also felt like they went super skimpy on the cheese.  Pizza was good but nothing special.
